snippet: As backhoes make way for two 15-story apartment towers that would block views of the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, a critic proposes a solution.
abstract: Michael Kimmelman addresses controversial construction of two 15-story apartment buildings that will obscure views of Cathedral Church of St John the Divine in Morningside Heights; suggests alternative construction of a single, taller tower that would only block views of the cathedral's unfinished transept.
lead_paragraph: As backhoes make way for two 15-story apartment towers that would block views of the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine, a critic proposes a solution.
